title: new poro icons
body:
riot lied, they said they'll be available for purchase on December the 16th.

hello where are they

replies.body: Could be running off NA time and not have told us for the millionth time.

Probably this. Check in 5 hours and 25 minutes.
7pm in Victoria, Australia.

thanks for this, this thread is the one place i found any satisfying information. i feel they should either release when stated, OR have it stated "16th dec (17th OCE)" just so we don't all freak out, 

tasty... precious... skins...

Expect things to be on NA time, almost everything they do runs off their time and they never had the effort in the past to adjust things for local time so that's my guess.
Also could be that there is a delay slowing the button pushing for release of all the snowdown stuff like legend of poro king
They probably meant the 16th PST date/time so 17th on OCE
I find it annoying as hell that they can release the new Summoner's Rift to each server at a different time, but not anything else.
I think its because if you buy snow day malz and then change to na server, everyone will get mad cos they dont have it
on the 16th. that means before 00:00. 17/12/2014. we still have time.

Did they say what time December 16th?
It's pretty early on in the day, give it time. :)
